data.title: Asset Localization
data.description: Building a Second Syntax for Your Brand

tab.title: Overview
markdown: Asset localization picks up where translation ends. An organization new to China often needs not just an optimal name translation, but an entire style guide and customized glossary, in order to create a foreign language syntax aligned with its carefully considered branding.

A B2B real estate publisher based in England sought to build an engaged community of Chinese real estate agents that it could connect to its existing base of global agents in order to tap the booming segment of Chinese overseas property buyers.
